title: Ravager noc, skin rework please
body:
So firstly, im sorry i stopped the champ concepts christmas and new year were pretty busy, will put up a champ or 2 in about an hour or so

the raveger nocturne skin isn't very great compared to the others, mayhaps riot would change it to being a flaming nightmare skin, like other champs there are fire and ice skins, but none have both, nocturne has frozen terror, he should be the first champ to have a fire and an ice skin, raveger should be that skin, make it the infernal nightmare or something

Q - Ball of fire - trail of fire behind the ball
W - Spell shield - Flames swirling around him for duration of the sheild
E - Tendrils - maybe flames flying at the target instead of black lines
R - Screen goes orange, upon hitting a target the mark that appears should be a flame   

Riot if you wouldn't mind please think about this

replies.body:
The quality put into this skin to make it look as cool as that idea sounds, would probably make it legendary status (1350 RP+)
That sounds really cool, and I agree too. It is a bit of a 'meh' skin.
Annie and Brand have fire and ice, but then maybe they don't count since it is, after all, classic.
